title: Bob Sheppard Led Jeter To The Plate One Last Time
teaser: When Derek Jeter took his final at bat last night in New York, he was following the voice of long-time Yankees announcer, Bob Sheppard, even though Sheppard died four years ago at the age of 99.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
